1.content:
So here are your first choices:

1) "Babysit-Babysat" (Mental/ and later physical)
17 year old Jane harkman, volunteers to babysit a slightly weird couples daughter Amy (around six), and the first thing she does once there is they play a game of house with Amy as the mommy and Jane as the baby, but as time goes on they seem to be taking this game a little seriously. What's happening to Jane’s mind? How can she be lifted and easily hurt by a six year old who is barely half her height? And why does everything, even Amy seem to be getting bigger? Now naturally this just her mind playing tricks on her as Amy is just a sweet little six year old... or is she?

2) "PUNISHMENT" (Forced)
This time they have been cault, Sarah Jason and Alex Truman (both sixteen, and both about 5ft3) are finally cault, the list of crimes that they supposedly did is sixteen miles long, but this time they have been cault, the crime, slashing their teachers cars tiers and vandalising her house, the punishment? The mothers manage to convince the authorise to let them off, but the girls aren't out of hot water yet? Both their mothers decided to regresses their daughters back to babies as punishment over the summer holidays, but both mothers can't take time off work, so who is going to watch there "Babies"? Answer two babysitters, and who are the babysitters? Just two girls who Alex and Sarah babysitted (and tortured) when they were twelve, but now at fourteen both have had their growth spurts and tower over their old tormenters. The girls are in for a heck of a summer with, two mothers who have turned them back to babies, two babysitters that are fuelled on hatred and anger towards them and the occasional popping round of a friend or foe to add a little more pain to the punishment.

3) "Hermonie's mistake?" (Fan fiction) (Mental)
Did Hermione really make such a big mistake with her temporal youth potion, or did someone add a little something to it? And what are the side effects? Could it have something to do with her loss of continence, and forced her to wear diapers (start with bed wetting and move on up), or her continual tempory child like behaviour and childish wims. Fortunately Ginny being a good friend, once she finds out starts looking after Hermione and the Christmas holidays come as a relief as there is virtually no one left at Hogwarts except her and Ginny, but is that a good thing? (Note this can involve Ginny having mental regression to but that your choice)

4) "Big girls don't wear diapers" (Forced)
19 year old sally Jackson goes to stay with her aunt for a few days, but her seven foot tall Amazon of aunt has other ideas, she decides that sally is going to become the baby she never had, and how does she do it? Making sally stay in a oversized babies nursery, lock all the bathroom doors so she has to use diapers, and taking all her clothes, and giving her only oversized baby ones to wear is properly a step in the right direction, but what is her secret weapon? And after it is used does sally remember being a adult? Or is she now a real baby?

5) Baby on Waverly place (fan fiction) (Mental/temporarily physical)
Alex never paied any attention in her wizard studies and now it has come back to haunt her. A strange magical artefact arrives out of nowhere and Alex, thing it looks good takes it, however it starts to have strange effects on her and soon she finds herself becoming split between the her normal self and her younger self, and somehow the artefact seems to be having effects on mortals (and dumb wizards), is Alex really becoming a baby or is it just a joke? And if it isn't why do others seem to think she is? And is there a cure?
1.title: The first five

She stood up, and then looked down at herself. She sighed with relief, as she noticed that everything was normal. After a moment, Amy returned.

"Now now, sit down, Baby!" she said, sternly. Just then, Jan found herself somehow swept off her feet by the smaller, younger girl, and softly set down on the floor on her bottom.

"Ok, open up for your paci!" Sang Amy.

Blushing, Jan complied with the little girl's demand, as the large, rubber nipple was shoved firmly into her mouth.

"Now, you leave that in there, like a good baby," said Amy.

Jan decided to suckle on the pacifier for a few minutes, just to please her charge. 'I take it out in a minute,' she thought to herself.

She removes her pacifier, and looks at Amy to see the little girl scowling angrily at her.

"BABY!" She says. Her sudden tone causes Jan to gasp in surprise. "Mommy told you not to remove that! Now you put that back in and come with Mommy for you spanking!"

Jan stuck her pacifier back in her mouth, and then found herself being yanked up by the younger girl with surprised force. She was led over to the couch, where Amy suddenly slung her over her lap.

"Now, this is gonnna hurt Mommy more than it hurts you!" She said.

'She doesn't know how right she is,' thought Jan, 'she will probably hurt her hand trying to spank me. But all of a sudden, Amy's hand came down HARD on her diapered butt. She couldn't believe how much it could hurt, especially through her diaper.

She moaned in pain into her pacifier, and suckled it harder. Soon, she began to cry, almost as much from embarrassment, as from the pain, that she was shocked this little child could induce.

Finally, it was over, and she was crying like a little baby. Amy got up, and helped her lay down on the couch on her back, still crying.

"Now, I think it's time for my baby to take a nap, but first, let me get your ba ba."

While Amy went to get the bottle, Jan lie there, sucking on her pacifier, blushing, and crying like a baby. How had this happened? This little girls shouldn't have even been able to fit her on her lap, much less hurt her.

Then, Amy returned and once again, shocked Jan out how easily she was able to lift her up, and set her over her lap. She pulled the pacifier out of her mouth, and replaced it with the nipple of the bottle. Jan began suckling it, in spite of herself, and blushed even more, as she was bottle fed by a girl practically HALF her own age.

Despite her embarrassment, she finds the bottle surprisingly soothing, as Amy pats her well-padded bottom. Finally, she is done, and is shocked to find herself being slung over Amy's shoulder, and patted firmly on the back, until she lets out a loud burp, causing her to blush once again.

"Come on now, Baby," says Amy, leading her by the hand, "Nap time for Baby."

After all that had happened, Amy was too embarassed to argue, and followed the little girl's lead, into her room.

'There is no way I will fit into that," she thought, when she saw the child's small bed.

But, sure enough, not only did she fit, but she soon found herself being tucked in so tight, that she couldn't move at all, no matter how much she struggled.

"Now, this pacifier is sure to stay in," said Amy, sticking one in her mouth with a strap around her head. Indeed, with her arms trapped under the covers, there would be no way for her to remove it from her mouth.

"Night night, Baby," said Amy, kissing Jan's forehead, before turning out the light, and leaving.

Jan couldn't believe this was happening, but despite herself, she found her eyelids becoming heavy after several long, boring minutes.

The girl quickly hopped out of Amy's bed and ran to the nearest mirror to see what had happened to her. Jane had top suppress a scream at what she saw. She looked like she was ten years old!

Jane ultimately decided against trying to leave; considering all that had happened already, she reasoned that the odds were stacked greatly against her. Besides, just looking at that paddle, and the thought of going over Amy's lap, made her bottom sting. Maybe if she just played it cool, and waited this all out, she could get Amy's own mom to help her out, when she got home.

"Alright," said Amy, sitting down on the couch, "Come over here on Mommy's lap, widdle girl."

Reluctantly, and with a sigh behind her pacifier, the child-turned babysitter went over to her former charge, and laid herself out across her lap.

"Alright, Baby. Take your paci out, so Mommy can feed Baby her bottle."

Jane obeyed, and soon found the nipple of a huge baby bottle shoved into her mouth. She noticed right away, that the milk tasted a little funny, like there was something in it, but she had no choice but to swallow, as the liquid continually seeped down her throat.

"Good girl," cooed Amy, softly, while patting her diapered bottom.

Jane blushed deep red at being bottle fed by a child, while in diaper on top of that. Yet, she knew there was nothing she could do about it, right now. After several minutes, she had finished the bottle, and felt like she would burst. She suddenly found herself over Amy's shoulder, (which didn't even make sense,) being burped by the little girl.

She blushed deep red again, as a large, distinct "BURP" escaped her mouth. This made her so embarrassed, that a tear ran down her bright red face.

"Now," said Amy, setting her down on the floor," You go play with your toys, and Mommy will watch you, for awhile."

Jane looked around, at the toys scattered around her: a teddy bear, a doll, a train, and looked back up at Amy. Amy gave her a serious look, before quickly glancing over at the paddle. Sighing, Jane began pretended to play with the toys, giving Amy a fake smile, every now and then. After a while, though, she felt the sudden urge to pee.
She wondered about what Amy had said, about her mother coming home soon. Maybe she could hold it...

Jane tried to hold it, busying herself even more, with the toys. After a moment, the feeling went away, but soon returned again. She concentrated hard on holding it, but she knew she couldn't last long. Amy must have noticed her struggling, for she suddenly found herself grabbed by the child, and hoisted up onto her lap.

"Awe, is baby upset? Here!"

And then, without warning, she started tickling Jane all over, starting with her armpits.

"Coochy, Coochy, Coo!"

Jane laughed out loud and screamed, at the sensations, as she was tickled under her chin, in her sides, in between her thighs, and behind her knees. Finally, Amy stopped, allowing her to catch her breath. It was then that she realized that at some point during the whole ordeal, she had wet herself. She looked down in shame, feeling the wet warmth spread throughout her diaper.

A moment later, she felt a rumbling in her tummy, and an instant later, felt her hiney exploding into her diaper.

"Eeeww!" exclaimed Amy, "Someone made a stinky winky!"

The redfaced Jane looked up at her, pleadingly, almost in tears, now.

"Amy PLEASE change my diapy!"

She couldn't believe how childish her own voice sounded. Suddenly, she felt a painful smack on her bare thigh.

"YOUCH!"

"That's MOMMY! Widdle girl! And NO! Mommy will NOT Change Baby's diapers, right now. I know you were trying to hold it, before. You will just have to wait until my Mommy gets home. Maybe SHE will change naughty baby's diaper! Until then, just sit her on my lap, and let's watch some TV!"

And they did just that. Amy set Jane on her lap, while they watched some stupid little children's show. Meanwhile, Jane wriggled and squirmed, in her uncomfortable, messy, diapers. She tried more than once to get up, but strangely, the younger, smaller girl, proved to be much too strong.

Finally, after about an hour, the door opened, and in stepped Amy's mother.

"Hi girls, I'm home!"

For the time being, Jane was too shocked and embarassed to move, much less speak, until the older woman walked over to them, crinkling her nose.

"Uh, oh. Smells like someone messed her diaper again."

'AGAIN!?' thought Jane, as she felt herself being lifted off Amy's lap.

"Yep, I had to change her into diapers again, Mamma."

"Well don't worry, sweet heart. Mommy will change you."

She was soon lying on her back, on the floor.

'ok! She said to herself, 'This woman you don't really know, is about to change your diaper-if you want to speak up, now's the time!'

(What would she do?)

"Ms... er...Mam... Um, I know this looks weird, me wearing a diaper and all, but."

"Not at all. I am afraid I'm actually not surprised at all." cooed the woman, as she untaped Jane's diaper, leaving her completely exposed. Jane blushed deep red, as she rushed to cover her crotch, but suddenly found her hands snatched back, by the woman.

"Hands back, sweetie! You don't have anything I haven't seen before!"

'WTF she talking about!' wondered Jane.

"Yes," she sighed, as she began wiping Jane's bottom down, "I am not surprised at all, but more than a little disappointed. But I guess I should have known you weren't ready to be a big girl, yet."

"Good night, Jane," Said Amy, sweetly.

"Good night," said Jane.

"See you LATER," Amy said, before turning and leaving.

"Ok," said Jane, but she was SURE she had detected something suspicious in the little girl's tone.

Now that Amy was gone, she watched a little more television, before she started to become sleepy, and dosed off.


When she awoke, it seemed to be morning, and looking around, she realized she was no longer in the living room. In fact, she was in AMY'S ROOM! She remembered it from the other night!

'what am I doing here?' she wondered. It was then that she realized she couldn't MOVE! Now she was scared. It felt like her whole body was made of plastic! She looked down at herself, and noticed she was wearing a super thick diaper, and a tiny little lacey nightie, and a baby bonnet. Then, she looked over and saw Amy, waking up, in the same pajamas she had had on the night before.

"Ah!" said the little girl, stretching. "I'm gonna go take a bath."

"AMY! AMY!" She called, "WHAT'S GOING ON!" But the girl didn't react at all. It seemed that she either hadn't heard her, or she was ignoring her. If only she could MOVE!

Amy walked right over to her, and as she was walking by, she said. "Good morning, widdle miss Jane!" She said, and continued on into the bathroom.

While she listened to the sounds of using the bathroom and taking a bath, she began to get even MORE worried. 'maybe she CAN'T hear me. Maybe I really AM just a baby doll,' she thought. Then, all of a sudden, she remembered what Amy had said before about her becoming a doll! 'OH NO!' After several horrible minutes, Amy finally emerged from the bathroom, butt naked, drying herself off with a towel. Jane caught her glancing over at her.

"Yes, I CAN hear you, Jane. Don't worry, Mommy will be over there in a moment."

Finally, she finished drying off, and pulled on a pair of panties, before walking over to Jane. She picked the little girl up, and carried her over the bed, laying her across her lap, like a baby. It was now that Jane realized she was just the size of a real baby, relevant to this little 6-year-old. She also noticed that she could actually MOVE now, even though Amy seemed to have complete control over her.

"Amy, what have you DONE to me!"

Amy didn't answer, but instead, reached over and grabbed a baby bottle, which she then thrust into the tiny Jane's mouth, who had no choice to but to suckle. This was extremely embarassing, and more than a little awkward, being bottle fed by a (practically naked) 6-year-old

"SHUSH, Baby!" she said sternly, "You just nurse your ba ba, and Mommy will explain. Now, Mommy warned you what would happen if you kept back talking. And now you will be Mommy's sweet widdle dollly. As you already saw, you can only move when mommy is holding you. That makes you turn into a real baby, but to everyone else, you just look like my new dolly who drinks, wets, and, you guessed it, POOPS! The same goes for talking. No one else can understand you, but me."

Jane was really scared, now. However, all she could do, was keep drinking while Mommy patted her diapered bottom. Finally, she finished the bottle, and found herself slung over Mommy's shoulder, being burped. She let out an audible belch, and blushed deep red. Then, she found herself being hugged against the naked child's chest.

"Oh, sweety! We are gonna have SO MUCH FUN, my widdle baby doll!" She pulled away, and looked into the eyes of Jane, who was almost crying by now. "And if Babydoll is Very Very good, I MIGHT just let you be a REAL girl again, some day!" She said, chuckling evilly to herself.

"Now then, let's get you ready to show you off to my friends!"

Where are they going?

This is an experimental three plot story, if you like it please post your comments in reviews or emails and I may make more:

As you arleady know it is Amy Hartwood twenty third birthday and she has gone to see her inventor boyfriend, whose name is james jackson (no laughting), Amy enjoys weird and odd things, so her always makes her things that do strange things, now this year he has made her as her birthday present a device called the age booth.

Now he was hesident to let her use it as he hadn't quite worked out all the bugs, but she managed to perswade him to let her use it, he explains that it is designed to make the person in side it any age that is set, while leaving there mind intact, and amy, being that kind of person is dieing to try it she gets in and, this is when we get to the experimental bit, below are three possible plot lines and I want you to chose which one this story follows.

A) The machine malfunctions and Amy finds herself back in 1988 (her first birthday), only with a adult mind and body (every one still sees and hears her as a baby though and she has a babys problems, IE tack of bowl and bladder control, can't walk or talk ect), the only way out of this for her is if she can get back to the age booth and hit the reset button, but with a infants abillities and to closely watching parents will she be able to do it?

B) The machine works but not in the right way, now she is changing ages every so often, and it isn't just younger she gets older as well, she finds that it mainly happens whiles she's asleep, and her boyfriend james, is constently trying to cure her, and at first it is only anoyying and embarissing, but as time goes on she starts to learn to control it, but as time goes on again it starts getting harder to change, and her boyfriend soon finds why, and soon it comes to what age will she stop at?

C) The machine malfunctions and Amy doesn't change, but as time goes own she discovers that the machine has reversed the aging process, in a way, and as such every so often she loses a year, her physical and mental age stays the same, but everyones perception and memories of her change, and she also finds that some peoples roles change, IE her friends become her babysitters or the disapear, IE eventually her boyfriend just sees her a some kid, and she has to find a way to reverse the prosses, but will she be able to do so before she becomes unborn?

And just as a little more information, amy is five foot five, has brown hair and green eyes, she is slim and hot, her favouite colour is blue and she is afraid of clowns.

All four of them froze and turned their attention to the stranger. Susan and Ashley and took one look at the stranger and they each wet their pants. All four friends had now wet themselves.

It was dark and late when Lisa, Fiona, and Wendy found the camp.

Lisa was an 18 year old girl. She was considered tall, and thin. She had short strawberry blonde hair. Her eyes were blue.

Fiona was a 19 year old girl. She was considered a short, thin, petite girl. She had shoulder length brown hair. She had gray eyes.

Wendy was a 22 year old girl. She was also considered a short, thin, petite girl. She had long blonde hair. She had blue eyes.

"Camp Child?" Wendy asked. "That's a weird name," she said.

"I don't care, we are lost, and I am scared, and we are all getting tired and cranky," Lisa said with a yawn.

Fiona nodded, "Lets at least go there, and see if they have any directions. Maybe they have spare beds," she said driving in that direction. They got to a building that said office.

"Hi, we were wondering if we could get directions, or if you had spare rooms?" Lisa asked.

"I have only one," she said.

As the girls followed, they saw on the desk that the lady's name was Moi Mah-mah. The lady, Moi Mah-Mah led them into a room that looked exactly like a large nursery.

1232.content:
Lisa opened her blue eyes and felt the urge to cry. She resisted that strange urge and looked around the room. Everything was dark. Wasn’t morning already?
The girl tried to get up, but then she realized something strange. The crib where she was sleeping into wasn’t her size anymore. It got much bigger. No… that wasn’t true. Looking around in the room, everything seems bigger, yet still proportioned, not like if everything got gigantic. There was just only explanation.
The girl looked down at herself, and she froze in terror. Opening and closing her mouth like a fish in surprise, she realized that her body got shorter and thinner.
“I’m shrinking!” she exclaimed, scared.
In hearing her own voice, she felt again the urge to cry: it was the exact same voice of when she was not older than 5 years old.
As they heard their friend voice, both Fiona and Wendy woke up. In horror, both realized the same things Lisa had experienced before them.
The girls were incapable of seeing each other in the darkness, but they could hear each other.
While Lisa was still shocked and was trying to don’t burst into tears, Wendy began to cry loudly, incapable of contain herself.
Fiona, the more rational of the three girls, tried to stay calm. She took a deep breath, and said aloud “Come on, girls. There must be an explanation. Use your reason.”
Her voice of a 5-years-old didn’t give much credibility to her words, however. She sounded more like a child that tries to act tough.
“What is the meaning of this?!” Lisa exclaimed, while Wendy continued to cry uninterruptedly.
“Seem like we are regressed to when we were five.” Fiona reasoned aloud, touching her chin. She was so cute in doing so that it was really a pity that the dark room prevented everyone to see it.
“But this is impossible!” Lisa shouted “Age regression doesn’t exist! You only find it in fictions!”
“You are right.” Fiona said, before looking in Wendy’s direction and exclaim “Wendy! For God’s sake! Stop crying!”
Wendy continued to sob, replying “I’m sorry. I can’t stop.”
“Ok, we have no clue on what’s happening.” Lisa said “Why don’t we sleep till tomorrow? Maybe it’s just a weird dream.”
“Yes, good idea.” said Wendy, nodding her head and calming a little “Maybe is a dream.”
Fiona wasn’t convinced about it. Were all three of them having the same dream? It sounder even more strange and absurd than the idea of been regressed. But she decided to listen to her friend and agreed to sleep on the problem.
The three 5-years-old girls, formerly teenagers, fell all asleep, unaware of an Asian woman that was watching them from another room on a baby monitor.
Moi Mah-mah smiled. Everything went according to plan.
The next morning, the girls woke up. They noticed that…

1243.content:
The next morning, Samantha wakes up groggily, but when she comes out of her room, her mother is dressed as if ready to go somewhere.

She then looks over to see another woman there, a stranger. It is a very tall woman, of large build, with dark hair tied up in a tight bun. She is wearing what looks like an old style nurses uniform, grey colored. She has a very stern, imposing look on her face.

"Goodbye, Baby. Mommy is going to live with your Aunt Clara. I will return soon. Until then, I have hired Mistress Evon to be your Nanny. She is very strict, and she is not afraid to paddle naughty little girl's bottoms. Also, I have already told her about your lying problem, so I suggest your listen and obey her."

With that, her mother turns and leaves.

"But MOM!" screams Samantha, but her mother completely ignores her. She tries to go after her, but Evon steps in her way.

"Your Mother is gone. From now on, I am in charge. Baby will answer everything I say, with yes Nanny, or Baby will be punished. Is that Clear?"

Samantha can do nothing but stair down at the floor, red-faced and furious.

"Ok" She mumbles. Suddenly, the woman reaches around, and gives her a very sharp smack on her rear.

"That's YES NANNY!"

"OUCH! YES NANNY!"

"Very Good" Replies the woman. Then, all of a sudden, without warning, she grabs Samantha by the ear, and pulls her towards the bathroom.

"Now, your Mommy has told Nanny about your lying problem. The first step in treating your problem, is to wash Baby's mouth out with soap. Samantha's eyes grew wide at this revelation, and she redoubles her efforts to escape from the agonizing grip on her ear. But it does her no good. Soon, they are in the bathroom before the sink. The woman grabs the soap, and brings it up to her mouth, commanding her to "OPEN UP!"

Samantha clamps her lips shut tight. The Nanny reaches around and gives her another pop to her bottom.
No sooner has she opened her mouth to say "OUCH", then the bar of soap is thrust into her mouth. Evan scrubs it back and forth so hard, that it gets ground into her teeth, and the horrible taste of it stings her tongue. Finally, she pulls the soap out, and wraps a firm hand over the girl's mouth.

"Now, you will keep that in there until Nannys says otherwise. Samantha is forced to just stand there as the horrible substance is swished around in her mouth. Finally, the hand is removed from her mouth.

"Now, rinse!" She quickly leans over, spits, and rinses her mouth out.

"Now, open up again."

By now, Samantha realizes that there is no chance of resisting, and with a sigh, she opens her mouth, and the horrible process is repeated. After rinsing again, Evan repeats the process one last time. By the time it is over, Samantha is almost to tears, and her whole mouth is stinging with the taste of soap.

Next, the Nanny reaches in her purse, and pulls out a giant pacifier, which she coats with liquid soap, before shoving it in the poor girl's mouth.

"Now, that stays there until Nanny says otherwise. Now, next, we're going to.."

It was a normal day in the potions room and the potion master was just as cruel as ever, today they were making temporal youth potions, so far there had been nineteen failures and one success and there was only one student left. Snape moved over to Hermione’s caldron, "Well miss Granger are you going to live up to your expectations or should I call madam Ponfrey to prepare another crib" He paused and in a strained voice he said "and of course as this is such a difficult potion, I... personally... award... a.... large...nnnummber... oooofffff.... points tooooo... ttthhheee house that suc...suc...succeeds" A colossal gasp came from all, and while snape turned round to settle the class no one noticed Draco malfoy pulling a blue vial from his pocket, he unscrewed the lid and while the room was still in confusion, he tossed the vial and all the potion fell into Hermione’s caldron. He knowing what was going to happen next he smiled.

Snape walked back to hermiones caldron, "Know miss Granger" he said "If you have got this potion right it should temporally reduce you to half your age for about three minutes, are you ready? Or are you going to admit it won't work, here and know and save yourself a week or two in a crib or nursery school?" Hermione paused for a moment, she had second thoughts about this, but she would show him, her potion was going to work. Granted she didn't want to become eight and a half again but it was only for a few minutes. "I'm ready" she said "and don't worry it will work", she put her cup in to the caldron and taking it out, held her nose and swallowed the whole mixture, and then she waited.

A few hours later

Hermione tossed and turned in her bed, but she couldn't seem to get any sleep, and she knew why, she couldn't believe she had made such a big mistake in potions today, harry had tried to convince her it was a fluke (Ron was in the medical wing having the last of the effects of his faulty potion take off him), but she wouldn't hear it, she the brightest witch in her year making as snape said the worst youth potion in nine hundred years, the humiliation, there was no way she was going to get any sleep tonight... unless. She reached over to her bed side table and picked up her wand, " afromoss insensider morphius" she said and soon after there was silence.

Hermione could not get peace even in her dreams though, she had a horrible nightmare that she was a baby and she was in a crib and she needed help with something but no matter how much she cried no one came, and then suddenly the how place burst into flames and she was trapped and the flames were getting closer and closer, she woke up with a gaunt, it was just a dream she told herself, it was just a dream, it was then she noticed something odd, her sheets were wet. In an instant she ripped off the covers and to her horror she saw she had wet the bed. The sheets, the mattress, her pyjamas they were all soaking wet. Hermione's face turned as red as a beetroot, she looked at the clock, 6:34 it read. A while before anyone else usually got up, after cleaning everything up with her wand and removing the smell, Hermione consulted herself on what had happened, had she been so stressed that she forgot to go to the toilet last night? No she was sure that wasn't it, but what else could it be? In the end she decided it was just the nerves, she got dressed and went down to wait for the others for breakfast.

She jumped up; Sonny ran over, "look out!" Zora cried, but it was too late, Sonny tripped over the wire, and crashed into the machine, the thing started shaking and great blue beam of light shot out of it, it hit Tawni who screamed, as her body started to glow, sparks started to fly from her, "Get down" Zora screamed, she and Sonny dived down.

The sparks shot around the room, colliding with objects, props and the wall, each time causing strange effects, the dead plant on the table, got hit, it two started to glow blue, as did the other objects, eventually effect faded, timidly the two of them got up of the floor, Tawni was lying on the ground, her hair was sticking up like she had been electrocuted, her clothes were singed and all the nails in her shoes had fallen out.

Sonny ran over to her, she didn't seem hurt, she was just uncounsious, Sonny turned to Zora, "What happened?" She screamed Zora however was staring at something else; Sonny turned round and was shocked at what she saw, the dead plant that had been hit, was now looked like it had just bloomed, and was perfectly healthy.

Another plant had transformed into a seed, the section wall that had been hit had turned to dust, the clock was spinning at such a rated that it looked like fan, and a smashed vase, was back on the table, fully repaired, even the cracks had vanished. "What?" Sonny managed, "Zora, what did that ray do?" Zora sighed, "It is my latest project, I was experimenting with time." she said.

"But not in the traditional way" she continued "Rather than causing something to travel through time, my machine is meant to trips time cycles." "What's that mean?" Sonny asked, "A time cycle is the time line of an object, from its creation till its destruction, well the machine was meant to trip that cycle, in theory and apparently in practise, it could make objects older or younger or what they once were." Zora said.

"I'm still confused." Sonny replied, Zora sighed, "Well for example this plant, has been restored to what it was say ten years ago, this wall is what it will be in a couple of hundred years, that vase is what it was before it was smashed, the machine can't make something, what it never was, or what it never will be, it can only cause it to become what it was or it is going to be now, by tripping its time cycle."

1322222.content:
Tawni and Sonny were walking down the halls, they had stayed Late so they could finish rehearsals a special sketch that they had come up with, they were just leaving when they heard the sound of some body crying, Sonny stopped "What's that?", "Who cares" Tawni replied "I want to get home, I'm missing my me time," "you've already had nine hours of you time, how much more do you need? Come one it sounds like somebody is in trouble."

Reluctantly Tawni followed Sonny along the corridors through the building, but strangely despite walking constantly towards the sound, they never seemed to get any closer, it was almost like the sound was moving away from them, the sound led them through the building and out into the parking lot, and then across the parking lot and on towards one of the old prop warehouses,

"I think we should go in there" Sonny said "the person seems to be inside there," "or we could go home, if anyone is that sad, we should leave them to themselves, besides, if it’s such a soft sound then how did it travel so far?" Before Sonny could even think about answering however a distinct sob came from inside the building, "Come on" Sonny said, she grabbed Tawni's arm and pulled her through the open doors, and into the building, it was dark in there, "Something feels wrong" Sonny said, and then the doors slammed behind them.

"I'm scared" Sonny said, "You can't be scared, I'm scared" Twani replied, Suddenly the flood lights came on, and the two girls grabbed each other, they found in front of the a giant machine, it was huge, the central column was grey round the bottom, with a dozen control panels around it, and a series of high tech computers attached to it,

The upper section of the machine was transparent; and had some sort of glowing blue device in the centre, with hundreds of wires plugged into it, at the top was something that looked a bit like an antenna, a bit like a satellite and a bit like a toaster. Around the sides were two main wings and going down from them where a series of wires at the bottom were two chairs.

“Impressive isn’t it” a voice said the two of them jumped, they turned round and saw Dakota staring at them, “Dekota? What are you doing in here? What is going on?” Dekota smiled, “Please take a seat” she said. “We’re fine” Sonny replied, “I said, Sit” she shouted.

The two of them jumped into the two seats closest to them, Sonny landed on a regular seat, while Tawni on one of the seats under the machine and wires, Dakota smiled and pushed a button, restraints on Twani’s chair closed round her arms and legs, she was trapped.

Sonny jumped to her feet, she ran forward only to hit what felt like a wall, she felt where she had hit, there was some sort of invisible energy barrier between her and Tawni, Dekota smiled and walked forward, she adjusted the controls on the control panel, before sitting down on the other chair.

“What is going on?” Tawni screamed “Well” Dekota began, they thing is I hate being little, and I don’t want to wait till I’m older so I had Daddies Scientists build this the Temporal Reality Phasing, Quantum Inducer”

Before either of them could ask, Dekota continued “with this machine, I can fool reality into thinking I’m older, it can even change other’s perceptions of me, so they think I’m older, all it needs it’s a subject to drain the age from”

The two girls looked at each other, and Tawni started frantically trying to escape, but it was no use, Dekota Smiled and started the machine up, there was a wiring sound, and then a large cranking started.

Dekota smiled, “Oh, almost forgot” the little girl jumped out of the chair, and quickly pulled all her clothes off, “I don’t want to be suffocated, by the two small material” she said, she jumped back in the chair, adjusted the wires, and pushed the big red button.

The machine started to hum, and the interworking’s started to move, the thing on the top started to move and then out of the top of the wing above her, came a great green beam of light, it surrounded Tawni in a thick green field of light.

And decoder in a red one, the machine a started to shake and then the rays started to change, the green started to become redder, while the red started to become greener, and slowly both fields of energy around both of them swapped colours.

The machine stopped wiring and the process was complete, the force field disintegrated, and Sonny ran over to Tawni, she helped her to her feet and was relieved to see that she hadn’t changed, “Ha” Tawni said, “your Machine doesn’t work”

“Doesn’t it?” Dekota asked, at that point Tawni’s skirt fell down, quickly she grabbed it and held it up, but it felt so lose, now she noticed it she realised that all her clothes looked baggy on her, she couldn’t have shrunk could she?

No, Tawni was still the same height she had been before, just a bit bigger than Sonny, and yet her clothes were acting like she was several sizes smaller, she picked her skirt off the ground again and held it up, it still looked the same, and it looked like it would fit, but when she attempted to put it on again, it still felt and acted as if it was too big.

“You better get out of those big clothes” Dakota smirked, “Here try something more your size” she handed Tawni a handful of the clothes Dekota had been wearing moments before, “they will never fit me Tawni” said,

“Try them” Dekota replied, out of mostly curiosity Tawni, started to strip, her clothes easily slid off her and on to the floor, she grabbed a pair of Dakota’s panties, they were tiny and childish, she knew they would never fit her, and yet they did.

Some how they fit her like a glove, the moment she got them on they seemed the right size, they completely covered that parts they were meant to and they fit perfectly, still curious Tawni started putting on Dekota’s other childish clothing, and she found the same result, they all fitted her perfectly it was like they were her size.

But that was impossible, wasn’t it? She was still pondering this when she spotted Dekota lifting up her clothes, “Hey” she said, but Dekota wasn’t listening, she slid Tawni’s underwear on, it fit her like a glove,

“That’s mine” Tawni said, Sonny who had been shocked silent for the last few minutes finally snapped out, “Um Tawni” she said, sounding a little scared, “What?” Tawni snapped, she pointed, and Tawni saw what she was staring at, despite not having any, Dekota’s new bra had full cups.

Twani gulped a looked down at her own chest, it was as flat as a table top, she quickly pulled the shirt she was wearing off, underneath she found her Breasts were still there, but when she put her shirt on it gave no indication of them.

She was perplexed; Sonny was still staring at Dekota’s chest Paradox, “Jealous?” Dekota asked, “I don’t blame you, who wouldn’t be?” she then went back to Tawni’s clothes and finished dressing herself up.

“Hey those are mine” Twani complained, “be quiet, little girl” Dekota replied, admiring herself in the reflection in the metal, “I’m not a little girl” Tawni spat back, “Oh really” Dekota replied, she through Tawni a tape measure, “Check” she said

Slightly scared, Tawni undid the tape measure, and measured herself, she screamed when she saw the result “4ft7 inches” it said, quickly she ran over to Sonny, she still appeared the same height in comparison to her, she took the tape measure and measured Sonny; she still had her normal height.

She measured herself again, and again, and again, only for each time it to say the same 4ft7 inches, she ran over to Dekota, “What is going on?” She screamed, “Move out of my little girl” Dekota replied “I’m not a little girl, now you better tell me what’s going on or I will pull you over my knees” Twani shouted.

“O really” Dekota replied, she grabbed Tawni and with no difficultly lifted her into the air, Twani screamed, “If you’re not a little girl, why do weigh the same as one? Why are you dressed as one?” Dekota asked.

She carried Tawni over to a chair, she sat down in it, and the laid Tawni over her knees, Twani tried to escape, but Dekota was somehow much stronger than her, “looks like someone needs to be taught a lesson” Dekota said.

She held Tawni down, and lifted her left hand up, above Tawni’s bottom, “You can’t go around threatening to attack people can you?” She asked, “No please, stop” Tawni cried, “I’m sorry, you can keep my clothes, I’ll never do it again, I wasn’t really going to hurt you, I’m sorry, I’ll never do it again, please don’t hurt me, please I’m begging you, please don’t” each time she got more frantic.

“Say it” Dekota said, coldly, “What?” Tawni asked, “You know” Dekota said, Twani didn’t say anything, Dekota lifted her hand higher, she held it there ready to tan Tawni’s hide, “I am a little girl” Tawni Cried, “I am, I am, I am”

Dekota smiled and released Tawni; she ran over and hid behind Sonny, “What has happened?” Sonny asked, she was still very much confused by all this, how did Tawni’s clothes fit Dekota? Why did the tape say she was so small? Why did her clothes show no evidence of her age or features? And why was Dekota so much stronger suddenly?

What was going on?

132311.content:
Raven yawned and stretched, looking at her clock she found it was almost ten, she groaned and started to get up she walked over to her closet and taking out some clothes she got her self-dressed, and walked up the stairs. She walked into the kitchen, she grabbed a bottle of cereal, and sat down she then noticed she had left her juice on the table, She groaned and was about to get up when the juice suddenly moved along the table and then through the air, then stopped in front of her.

She stared at it perplexed, Cory walked in, "I know I'll trick raven into lending me some money for lunch" she heard him say, "No you won't" Raven replied, "I won't what?" Cory asked confused, "You said you would trick me into giving you money for lunch" Raven said annoyed, "I didn't" Cory replied confused, "I thought it", Raven stared at him confused, "You’re not having another one of those freaky psychic colds, that lets you read minds" Cory said.

"No," Raven replied, "I feel fine, Man I wish Mom was here, she would know what's going on", there was a flash and there mother stood their in front of them, Raven looked at her shocked, "Bu...bu...but how?" she said, "I got to go" Cory replied and ran off, Tanya sat Raven down, "what is the matter?" she asked, Raven explained to her all these weird occurrences, with the moving of objects, and the mind reading, and now her appearing.

Tanya thought for a moment and smiled, "Mom, do you know what it is?" Raven asked, her mother nodded, "Yes, your grandmother told me this might happen, but I didn't think it would", "What?" Raven asked. "Well you know how when you grow up, your body changes?" her mother asked, raven nodded, "well for Psychics, their minds change, and this is causing a variety of psychic abilities to evadible to you, temporarily. Each one only lasts a little while, and it doesn't come back afterwards, so far you've had Telekinesis, Telepathy and Teleportation, you should get a few more and then it will be gone for ever"

She replied, Raven sighed "How long does this last for?" "About a day or two" Raven's mother replied, "Now off to school with you, and be careful." Raven sighed, and got ready, she walked out through the door dreading the day she would have.

A few hours later she returned, smiling so far she had had a good day, each one of these temporal psychic abilities had come at the right time, when her teacher had asked her for her homework, that she had forgotten, to bring, her mind control had convinced him to forget about it, it had also caused Alan a embarrassing incident that would haunt her to her grave.
And she had to say the astral projection was fun, especial when she was able to see all those embarrassing secrets her enemies had, possession had also brought them down, and put them in there places.

Not only that but she had, had a lot of fun during her extra-long recess, that she was still smiling about, there were only a few left and then it would be gone for ever, Raven sat down and spotted her favourite chair, she had had it for years since she was a little girl, it was old and girly but she still liked it,
Looking at it she wished that she could still fit into it, and then suddenly she felt sick, she bent over and groaned, she needed help, she ran for the door, but her clothes were now like a tent on her, and she tripped over them, she started crawling towards the door, but it was too late, the changes had occurred, and now she found she was…

How old?

"I understand, Hey would you like to earn yourself some cash, I'm looking for volunteers for my new project" the scientist said, "Great I'll volunteer" Chelsea replied, "Okay, if you’re sure" the scientist said, "Now what is it I'm volunteering for" Chelsea asked, "I'll show you" the man replied, he lead her into the building, the room was filled with computers, charts and pictures of babies.

"you see, I'm a child psychologist and I'm trying to gain a better understanding of Babies", "Okay" Chelsea replied, she didn't really know what that was but it sounded important, "so I'm looking for volunteer’s, who for the next two weeks will act like and be treated like a baby." Chelsea was a little taken back, "so your saying you want me to act like a baby?"

The man nodded, "yes, it will give us a better understanding of babies lives, every night you will record a log of the day, and then at the end give them back to me, and I will process the data, and use it to understand the life’s of infants," "of course" he went on, "I will happily pay for any expenses, and you will be paid handsomely for your troubles"

"Okay" Chelsea said a little unsure, "don't worry, the man said "you won't become a baby, you just have to act like one, it will be over before you know it, now here is the address of where you will be staying, and feel free to invite your friends, okay bye" Chelsea, left, she was still slightly unsure, but then again it was volunteering, she was sure she would find it fun,

1331.content:
It was midnight and Alex was rummaging though the refrigerator. He pulls out the milk to pour it into a glass.

"Honey, milk will give you nightmares if you drink it before you sleep." His mother warned him.

"That's nothing but a myth, mom." Alex replied as he took a chug from the glass.

"Ok, but don't say I did'n warn you. Good night, Alex." his mother told him as she headed out the kitchen.

"Good night, mom." Alex put the glass in the sink and milk back in the refrigerator. He went up to his room and slipped into his bed.

That night he had strange dreams of himself in diapers playing with baby toys. He was still his age and height, but everyone talked to him as if he was a baby. No one we talk to would believe that he was really seventeen. Alex woke with a shock. He felt his face covered in cold sweat.

"What a nightmare! Glad that's over." He told himself. Then Alex noticed what seemed to be his own room, but soon realized that several things are wrong.

First, he was wearing a powder blue footed sleeper and thick diaper underneath. He was in a large crib with baby blankets that had yellow duck patterns on them. He tries to get out, but the crib is locked. Alex looks outside his crib and sees a changing table, a toy box, and a rocking chair.

"What is going on? Why is my room like this?" Shouted Alex. Just then.....

After a lot of thinking, he decided that it was too risky, to ask Carly he would have to do this alone, fortunately he already had most of things he would need, his mother had bought a lock up, where she kept all Freddie’s out toys, as she dreamed that one day he would want to be her baby again and need them, plus he his mother was out of town for the week, it was perfect.

He got the key from his mother’s room, and then walked down to the lock up, he opened the door, and woo and behold all the stuff was there, and best of all, ever since he had given it up, his mother had replaced each of the things with larger versions of the same thing, so all of them were the right size, he got to work, it was difficult but he had to do it.

He moved the unneeded stuff into the second room, and then got to work, he installed a crib, changing table, baby bath, wardrobes and draws, he then started painting the walls till they were all pink, and then added a carpet to the floor, he then went outside and brought in all the clothes he had bought and filled the wardrobes with giant baby dresses, sleepers, pyjamas, onsies, and other baby clothes, he noticed that almost half the stuff he had ordered was the wrong size, it was a bit too big, he shrugged he would throw them away later.

After that he filled the draws with baby diapers, pacifiers and other baby accessories, and smiled admiring his handy work, he then ran out to the drug store, and bought everything he needed, he ran up to his room, and after mixing a few chemicals, he made some knock out gas, he snuck into Carly's room, Sam was lying on the sofa, she didn't see him.

Slowly he crept up behind her and then opened the bottle, the gas fluttered through the air, in minutes Sam was out, he crept round and lifted her up, fortunately she didn't weigh much, he was about to escape, when suddenly Carly came down the stairs, "Hey, Sam is there any popcorn le..." she was cut off when she spotted Freddie.

"Wha... wha... what?" She said, quickly Freddie through the remainder of the liquid at her, she collapsed, he walked over, it looked like he now had two babies, he shrugged, this could be fun, one to care for, one to be mean to, he carried Sam outside and placed her in the giant pink stroller he had ready for her, he then snuck back and lifted Carly up, before taking both of them into the elevator...

He turned his attention to Carly and started to wash her, unlike Sam, she didn't misbehave, not even when he was washing sensitive areas, when he did that with Sam, she flew into an even greater fit. He reached over and grabbed two different shampoo bottles, one he added to Sam's hair, the other he added to Carly’s he rubbed both in and then grabbing a basin of water tipped half over Sam and half over Carly, and then repeated.

Sam’s eyes stung, but Carly was fine, when he finally finished, he lifted both girls out and started to dry them with towels, he then rapped both of them up in a separate towel, and left them sitting on the bed, Carly seemed okay with experience but Sam was still edgy, then she noticed what Freddie was doing, he had gathered up all their clothes, or in Sam's case, what was left of them and was placing them inside an barrel, he grabbed some bottle of something, before pouring it also into barrel, he took out a box of matches and lit one, and then through it into the barrel, flames leapt up as all their teenage clothes they had with them were incinerated.

You became as small as a baby and your clothes bunched up around you. Mrs. Hillford quickly pulled away all your clothing, leaving your body completely exposed. She put a small diaper on you that attached you to the carseat.
"What have you done?" I squeaked, my voice much higher than normal in my baby state. In response, Mrs. Hillford took out a bright pink pacifier.
"No more talking, baby." She said to you. She popped the pacifier in your mouth, embarrassing you immensely. You tried to pull it off but it was stuck fast, ruining any chance of communication with the outside world. Next, Mrs. Hillford put a bright yellow onesie on you, sealing it tightly on with duct tape. You tried to peel it off, but your new baby hands weren't strong enough.
1423.title: You started to shrink

144131.content:
Cody and Bailey sat down and Admired there handy work, it was hard to believe how quickly they had completed the modifications to The room, First they had had, all of London's things had been moved to the storage rooms, so the only things left in the room were Bailey's, they then removed everything Baily didn't need so there would be more room, for London's new stuff.

The next thing they did, was make certain that London didn't come into the Cabin while working, by telling her that the person you stood on in a storage closet in complete darkness the longest, was allowed of the ship early, then once that was done they began work on the cabin its self, first the fixed the door and changed the lock so it would only open with a key, and gave it a mechanism, that once turned on meant it locked automatically when the door was closed.

Next they got to work on the walls, this was trickier but eventually they made the whole room sound proof, they did this wall by wall, and then the floors and the celling, next they did the same thing to the bathroom, they didn't want London crying in the night to wake any of the other passengers up, or her screams attracting any unwanted attention.

Once that was done, they removed London's bed, and moved Bailey's so it gave the room more room, after checking every precaution, and fixing a few traps just in case of a worst case sinareo happened, once that had happened the two of them got on with the hard part, the had to carefully and quickly move all of London's new baby stuff into the room and then started to install it.

While Bailey began on installing the crib, where London's bed had been, while Cody plastered the walls in London's section, with a pink and Blue Teddy bear pattern once that was done, he helped Bailey install London's Baby Bath into the bathroom, and filled the cabinets, with baby power, baby shampoo, baby oil and other baby stuff.

They then filled her up till then empty wardrobes with her new baby outfits, dresses, pyjamas and other baby accessories, while Bailey filled draws with fresh diapers, Pacifiers and other baby equipment, then Bailey fitted in her new changing table, while Cody made the necessary alterations to the stuff they had, fitting London’s crib and changing table with straps so she could escape from them.

As a final touch he installed a powerful baby monitor between his cabin and this one, so he could listen if there were any problems, while bailey added the teddy bear, dolls and other baby toys to keep London amused. Finally finished the two sat down on Bailey's bed to relax.

Back to the present

The two sat there admiring there work, it had only taken then five hours, and everything was done now, "You know why we are doing this?" Bailey asked Cody "Because you’re sick of how she treats you, and to be truthful, so am I, it right" Cody replied, "Right" Bailey said, "Plus the added Bonus that it allows us to parents together" Cody continued.

Bailey smiled, she had always wanted to be a mother and to have a little girl, to bring up in her image, or at least in the image she wanted to be brought up but wasn't "Yes, that is going to be great" Bailey said, "And also because this teach her a lesson," she continued. "You know Bailey, there is no one on the planet I would rather be a parent with than you" Cody said, Bailey flicked her hair back, and uttered her cute chuckle.

Suddenly the door started to open, "its London" Bailey whispered, "Get in position" Cody go up and quickly crept over to the control panel, the door opened and London walked in...

London was really getting interested in her new toys now, she had forgotten how much fun they were, in fact she had forgotten all together how much fun being a baby was, after all from now on she didn't have to go to school, or do homework, or do pretty much anything, she had two devoted parents to look after her, and she now had no responsibilities, plus she could now wear all those childish outfits that she had always thought were cute, but she was too old to wear. And if that all wasn't enough, she could play with her fun toys all day.

However as she played, she lost track of the time, and before long two hours had gone by, and as this time went by she started to think about the other side of the coin, after all although she had gained much, she had also lost much, she could no longer go shopping on her own, or do practically anything on her own, she was totally dependent on Mommy and... On, Cody and Bailey now. Plus she had also lost all her privacy, she could now longer do anything on her own, there would be someone watching here at all times.

And there was all the other things she had lost, dates, her phone, going to the mall, her money, now that she thought about it she had lost almost as much as she had gained, and if that wasn’t enough, it dawned on her she couldn't see her friends any more, she wasn't even sure if she could leave this room, and of course there was the fact that she also had no certainty over how long this was going to last,

She weighed the two in her mind, it was difficult to tell which was, better, she liked and disliked different parts of the change, as she was thinking, Bailey walked over; "so is our Lil London, ready for lunch?" Bailey asked, how did London react?

Maddie began, "I said NOW" Arwin shouted, Maddie jumped up and ran out of the room.

About twenty minutes later she arrived at Arwin's Lab, she walked in, Arwin grabbed a serign and stuck it into her arm "Ow" she said, then she suddenly felt so awake and refreshed, "That should stop you sleeping for a few hours" Arwin said, "Okay what have you found" Maddie asked, "I've found out why you are traveling through time every time you fall asleep" Arwin said.

"Do tell" Maddie said, Arwin walked over to a black board and flipped it, on the other side was a picture of maddie, a quite crude one, but still one of her. "You remember those high Chronotron readings I found earlier?" Arwin asked, Maddie nodded, "Well it turns out there are more, the ones around your body you must have picked up while traveling though time, but there are more, as it turns out there are several hundred thousand ones in your blood stream" he said.

"What?" Maddie said, "So they are responsible for me travelling back in time? How? How did they get there? Why does it only work when I fall asleep?" "I'm just getting to that" Arwin said, "How they got there I have no idea, the closest analogy I can think of for Chronotrons is Alpha Particles, they shouldn't be able to get into your body, unless you ate them, which is also virtually impossible."

"As to how, like alpha particles Chronotrons have a high energy, so a high ionising factor, only instead of ionising matter, they ionise time, thus causing temporal distortions, while in the time space vortex, they are surrounded by temporal energy so there effects are nullified, but out her there is less Temporal energy so there effects are more, it is those distortions that is causing you to travel through time."

“But why do I only travel through time when I’m asleep?” Maddie asked “We because when your awake your blood stream is moving at a rate two fast for the chronotrons damage to be anything more than minor, as such time simply heals the scratch, but when you sleep your blood rate slows down considerably, thus meaning that the chronotrons spend more time in similar spaces, thus causing more damage on time.”

“Eventually these cracks and chips become too much, as such time bleeds, and the temporal distortion causes you to be catapulted through time.” Arwin finished, “But why backwards? Time moves Forwards.” Maddie asked.

“It turns out these are Anti chronotrons” Arwin said, “Anti what?” Maddie asked, “Much like matter and Antimatter has protons and Antiprotons, Time has an Anti-time, which has Chronotrons and Anti Chronotrons”

“They almost exactly the same, but have the exact opposite effect, that is why they cause you to travel back though time, instead of forward, they are also the reason that there are so many Chronotrons on your skin, like in everything else, In temporal physics, opposites attract.” “Well that was a nice lesson on temporal physics, quantum mechanics and theoretical physics, but what do we do?” Maddie asked.

“Well in theory if I could collect enough normal Chronotrons then inject them into you, then there effects should counteract each other, and keep you in sync with time, as it when you are out of sync that you can travel through it.” Arwin said.
“The only problem is there is almost no way to collect Chronotrons, it will take me days to get enough,” Arwin said, “But I can’t stay awake for that long” Maddie said, Arwin nodded “I know ” he said, “That’s why I need to find a way for you to sleep.”

Maddie looked worried, “Still there is some good news” Arwin said, “What?” Maddie said hopefully, “Well I calculate that eventually there will be so many Chronotrons sticking to your skin that they will counteract the effects of the Anti-Chronotrons in your blood so you won’t age away to nothing.”

“Of course he went on "by that point if the rate of time continues to increase at the same rate you will be somewhere between five and one, which isn’t that good I suppose” "Maddie’s hopes collapsed again.

"Now class" Cody began, “today I'm going to let you make whatever you like, and when you’re done I'll come tell how you did on it", as such the class quickly got to work, each making their favourite, Bailey decided to make some old apple pie, like her mother did back in cattlecorn, she went and got the ingredients, and returned to her table.

She quickly got to work, but she had never been good at cooking, partially because she was against the idea of 1950's woman, partially, because she was just bad at it, Cody walked over, "Well miss picket" he said with a smile "Yes sir (Cody liked being called sir or Mr Martin in class, so everyone did)" she said also smiling "if you’re making what I think you are, you might want to peal your apples before cutting them" he said.

She smiled as he walked off, and began pealing the apples, she was half way through when, she looked up and saw Cody was helping another girl, she didn't know her name, but she was tall and had red hair, the girl was clearly having trouble with stirring the mixture, so Cody had put his arms on the utensils and was helping her with it.

Bailey's vision turned green, "Mr Martin" she called "Could you help me?" Cody walked over and gave her a hand peeling the remainder of the apples before leaving again, she turned to making the crust, she grabbed the flour, eggs and sugar and started putting them in the bowl, she looked up again and smiled seeing Cody sitting at his desk.

Suddenly a voice called "could you help me please sir?" she turned and saw the voice had come from Debby greensand, and normal sized black haired girl, who had been watching him since the start. Cody rushed over to help her, "here you go" he said as the two of them got to work with her project, again bailey saw green.

She called for Cody a second time, "In a minute" he replied, she gasped, and tried again, only to be met by a similar response, not thinking properly she quickly grabbed several eggs and dropped them, "Help sir, I dropped my eggs she called" Cody walked over, Bailey batted her eyes at him, "There there, here have some more" he said

And he handed Bailey another couple of eggs, she smiled, and watched as he walked away, it then became obvious to her that the whole class staring at her, she gulped and turned to face her work, realising that she had to stop getting so jealous, Cody liked her, not any of these other girls, she kept repeating that in her head, after finishing the crust, she got to work on the apples.

Taking a knife she began to cut the freshly peeled and decorated with cinnamon apples, she began chopping, only to here another girl calling for Cody’s help, she managed to resist the urge to look up, deciding that it would just make her jealous again, so she continued cutting the apples, until she heard a giggling. Giving in to temptation she looked up, a decision she would live to regret.

She saw Amber Bradly and Cody together, and the sight alone was enough to make her turn greener than the wicked witch of the west, as Amber was that sort of girl who somehow seemed to look perfect, the sort that the sun always glistened off, the sort that her long blonde hair was always perfect, her flawless skin seemed to glow. She was just a bit shorter than Cody, and basically she was the sort of girl, which she had nightmares about stealing Cody off her.

But what made it even worse was what they were doing, Cody had clearly helped here with her project, which appeared to be soup, and she was spoon feeding a Cody a sample, Bailey felt more jealous than she had ever felt in her life; but before she could do anything about it, she didn't see where she was cutting, and accidentally the knife went onto her finger.

She let out a ear aching scream, and felt like crying, although she managed to control herself, Cody ran over "What's the Matter" he called, Bailey didn't say anything she just held up her finger, "there, there" he said "I'll get the nurse". Bailey however didn't want him to go, so she let open the flood gates, and tears poured out of her eyes.

Instantly Cody came by her side, and started to comfort her, after a while she started to feel better, and Cody sensing this, started to get up, to get the nurse, however she still didn't want him to leave, so sadly she wept "don't leave me", "I'll be back in a little while" Cody said, again he tried to get up to leave, however bailey grabbed him by the shirt, and cried "Don't leave me"

"I'll be back in a minute" he said, as he struggled, but Bailey held firm, she then pulled, Cody, who had never been of strong build fell, he grabbed the table cloth, as he did and everything on the table went flying, bits pastry, apple, and cutlery short around the room, hitting all the other students, everyone screamed and ducked,

The Chopping board hit the oven door, and the glass smashed, as the oven was on, the board quickly went up, and the flames spread on to the table, and then on to the stack of papers on the table. Cody, who was the first one, was the first one to see this, "F...Fi...Fire" he screamed, the girls jumped up and also started screaming, "Abandon class room" Cody shouted.

Everyone ran out of the doors screaming, Woody grabbed Addison and said "I'll save you Addison" and ran into the window, only for him to hit the glass, he got up and said "ow", Addison grabbed him and pulled him out through the door that was next to the window.

A few hours later, Cody was sitting in his cabin, in a huff, he couldn't believe what Bailey had done today, the fire had been put out, but till they could repair the kitchen, the cooking class had been cancelled, and he was having to work over time to help pay off the bill, although he had managed to get some of it off London, due to the fact he had bet her that she couldn't find the x on a map, which he won as it turned out she couldn't spell X.

155232.content:
Alex really wished she had someone there to play with. She wished that Gigi was there to play with her.

She thought it would be funny if her old school 'rival' was dressed in diapers too.

Without realizing it, there was a bright flash. Then there was a knock on the door. Alex ignored it and kept playing.

She did look up when she saw Harper enter the room. However, she was a little surprised to see Harper holding Gigi's hand. She was also surprised by what Gigi was wearing.

Gigi was wearing shoes and socks on her feet. The shoes were Velcro. She also had on short frilly ankle socks. She was wearing an onesie over what looked like a disposable diaper. Her hair was in pig tails. She even had a pacifier in her mouth.

Alex's eyes got wide as Harper checked Gigi's diaper. Gigi didn't seem phased by it.

Harper then patted Gigi's butt and said, "well, you two play, and I will come check on you in a bit."

Alex was staring at Gigi. "What?" Gigi asked.

"Didn't that bother you?" Alex asked.

"Why would it? I've been like this since birth," Gigi said. "Are we going to play or not?"

"Yeah," Alex said and started playing.

After a while...

info.brief_description: A story about Age regression, fan fiction and adult babies, that any one can add to!
info.description:
Attention: welcome to the Pampered Tales of the Unknown!

Here you will find a collection of storys all about age regression and adult babies.

Every one is allowed to add to this story arc as long as they follow the rules;

Rules:
No swearing
no sex
no insulting any religon
no killing charecters (only I can do that)
no replacing charecters (you can add new ones though)
keep in the age limit
no drug use or refrence
no nudity

fan fictions are not only allowed, they are encouraged, just as long as they stay in the limit (If you want to see a fan fiction of a program you like, but for some reason can not add, email me and I'll proberly do it)

Also although physical age regression is allowed mental is prefered.

Also, although this may seem self explantiry, just to make it clear, don't go into to much detail with the info on each story, so that others can add things they want.

Also the info on the story has to be folowed to the line, you can add new things in but whats written there must appear in the story somewhere (which is why I don't what you to go into to much detail about the story in the info)

Also it is a rule that all options blocks have to be used, unless in a situation that I deam okay, also as a linking rule for the first few pages that have five options can not be used, as such each story that leads to a page with five options will have the choice for the story you selected or anoghter one of the four new ones. (See inside)

Also, just to clear things up, their are three classes of regression:
Physical
Mental
Forced

Physical means that the charater or charaters reggress physically, there bodies become younger.
Mental means that the charater or charaters regress mentally, there minds become younger.
Forced means the the charater or charaters don't regress in any way, they are forced by someone or some people to act and/or dress like they are younger.

As a note I would like to thank the author Creepy Crawly, for not only being the greatest authour to ever add to this sight but for helping me make my last such story take off and for giving me the title that this Arc is named. If your going to read any ones work read his, its better than anyone elses.
